message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, I'm not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. It's still a good deal for you, as the product is worth more to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm not sure I can meet you halfway, but I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
